ygData.subject: Re: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Whooo-hoooo!  Now that s a feature I can live with :o) -=B=- ... From: Eric Cathell  To: eqbards@onelist.com  Date:
ygData.messageBody:
Whooo-hoooo! Now that's a "feature" I can live with :o)

-=B=-
-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Cathell <embroidery@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 9:05 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Interesting bug


>From: "Eric Cathell" <embroidery@...>
>
>No that happened to me on the test server and a couple of my friends on
>other servers....it seems that if you try to zone with less than a bubble
>and die during the zone the AI doesn't know what to do with you so it puts
>you back at the last saved point or maybe its the safe spot for the
zone....
>
>Cethan 14 necromancer, TS
>Jalaric 8 Bard, TS
